definition: portrait (painting, photo etc)/(in a general sense) representation of a person/likeness
to resemble/to be like/to look as if/such as/appearance/image/portrait/image under a mapping (math.)

sentences.english: I haven't done many portraits, but I could paint landscapes in my sleep.
sentences.chinese: 我画的肖像画不多，但是我闭着眼也能画风景。

sentences.english: The portrait is drawn from the life.
What am I going to do with a life-size portrait of a bishop?
sentences.chinese: 我要如何处理一副主教的真人大小的肖像呢？

sentences.english: Mana Lisa probably is the world's most famous portrait.
sentences.chinese: 他的《蒙娜丽莎》是世界上最有名的人物肖像画。

sentences.english: Special Jerry Hsu photo portrait footbeds.
sentences.chinese: 特别许克威照片肖像鞋垫。

sentences.english: However, being portraits of former Headmasters has gained them a unique quality.
sentences.chinese: 不过，作为已故校长的肖像，他们有一个独有的特点。

sentences.english: Portraits should usually be taken in soft light.
sentences.chinese: 通常拍人物肖像时我们应当选择柔和的光线。

sentences.english: Her portrait appears on the front cover to that magazine .
sentences.chinese: 她的肖像刊在那份杂志的封面上。

sentences.english: It contains portraits of famous historical figures from the Sichuan Province.
sentences.chinese: 寨内有四川著名历史人物的肖像。

sentences.english: The dispute illuminates the primitive nature of our attitude to portraiture.
sentences.chinese: 这一争论阐释了我们对肖像画的态度的本性。

sentences.english: Poor Clare Nuns attempted to repair this damage with patches.
sentences.chinese: 可怜的克莱尔修会修女尝试去修复这个肖像。

sentences.english: Finally, legal responsibility for tort of portraiture right has been confirmed.
sentences.chinese: 最后，文章明确了侵害肖像权的法律责任。

sentences.english: Here the author tries to introduce you Lang's out- standing portrait-painting from rarely known aspect.
sentences.chinese: 本文从鲜为人知的角度，介绍了他出色的人物肖像画。

sentences.english: His portrait was mounted in the fancy frame.
sentences.chinese: 他的肖像用一个很别致的框裱起来。

sentences.english: For instance, you may like this portrait of Pat in a square format, or cropped to a horizontal.
sentences.chinese: 例如，你喜欢帕特的肖像为方格式，或者裁成横幅。

definition: portrait/to do a portrait of sb
to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]
